query:
UPDATE deals 
SET 
  currentValuation = '200',
  revenue = '98.4',
  ebitda = '1',
  debt = '56.8',
  league = '2.Bundesliga',
  investmentThesis = 'Turnaround opportunity in historic German club. Hertha BSC is showing positive operational momentum with 2 consecutive years of positive EBITDA after financial restructuring. Currently in 2.Bundesliga with potential for significant value creation upon promotion to Bundesliga. Strong brand, infrastructure, and €40.5M hidden reserves in player squad (vs €2.3M book value).',
  keyRisks = 'Second division status limits revenue potential. Negative equity position (€-38.4M). Uncertain promotion timeline. €40M bond obligations due 2028. Competitive German football market.',
  valueCreationOpportunities = 'Bundesliga promotion would increase revenues 50-100%. Operational improvements driving EBITDA margin from 1% to 8%+. Debt reduction program (€20M bond buyback planned). Player development and trading. Commercial revenue growth. Cost optimization already showing results (€4M annual savings achieved).'
WHERE name LIKE '%Hertha%';
command:

SET 
  currentValuation = '200',
  revenue = '98.4',
  ebitda = '1',
  debt = '56.8',
  league = '2.Bundesliga',
  investmentThesis = 'Turnaround opportunity in historic German club. Hertha BSC is showing positive operational momentum with 2 consecutive years of positive EBITDA after financial restructuring. Currently in 2.Bundesliga with potential for significant value creation upon promotion to Bundesliga. Strong brand, infrastructure, and €40.5M hidden reserves in player squad (vs €2.3M book value).',
  keyRisks = 'Second division status limits revenue potential. Negative equity position (€-38.4M). Uncertain promotion timeline. €40M bond obligations due 2028. Competitive German football market.',
  valueCreationOpportunities = 'Bundesliga promotion would increase revenues 50-100%. Operational improvements driving EBITDA margin from 1% to 8%+. Debt reduction program (€20M bond buyback planned). Player development and trading. Commercial revenue growth. Cost optimization already showing results (€4M annual savings achieved).'
WHERE name LIKE '%Hertha%';
